content.raw:
Ogre imposes some constraints for the terrain size:

  * Terrains must be square
  * The number of vertices along the edge of the terrain should be 2^n+1

When I split the terrain I should keep these constrains for each piece. In addition the pieces must have the same size. That essentially forces us to use a n^2 number of pieces, where n must satisfy the previous conditions. 4 and 16 worked fine. The next value is 64, but for some reason that I do not understand did not work. I know it is related with another internal tile division that Ogre performs. [MinBatchSize](http://www.ogre3d.org/docs/api/html/structOgre_1_1Terrain_1_1ImportData.html#a60b1682048188053cc885097eb2383c6) and [MaxBatchSize](http://www.ogre3d.org/docs/api/html/structOgre_1_1Terrain_1_1ImportData.html#acebf6cfa7dcb63b4725ed1dc2e63a9f2) has to be adjusted properly but all my tests did not work.
